H2: Extract audio from your videos online
TITLE: Extract audio from your videos online
META: Easiest way to Extract audio from your video in no time
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our video editing process elegant and straightforward
The results are accurate and hence completely satisfy user needs
You can use this application from now on any operating system, like Windows/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone.
There is no server involved and hence your video is safe
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
The application works completely on your browser without invlolving any server.Hence your data is safe

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to crop your mp4
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Choose your crop aspect ratio or manually create your crop ratio
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to split it.

FAQ.question: How can I extract audio from multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: With extract audio, you can extract audio from your video files, one after the other. When you extract the audio from one file and click on extract, the video will be processed. After the video has been processed, you can see the download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the file. In order to extract audio from another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see the upload video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to extract audio.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Are the test results accurate and correct?
FAQ.answer: Your test result is 100% accurate and precisely calculated

FAQ.question: Why is my video taking lot of time to extract?
FAQ.answer: Your video maybe of very large size. As we dont use servers,large video files take a bit of extra time to process
